# Headline



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                | Type                                                                                                            | Default        |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `align`    | `align`    | The text alignment of the component.                       | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"`                                                                                 | `"left"`       |
| `ellipsis` | `ellipsis` | Adds an ellipsis to a single line of text if it overflows. | `boolean`                                                                                                       | `false`        |
| `level`    | `level`    | Headline level/hierarchy.                                  | `"1" \| "2" \| "3" \| "4" \| "5" \| "6"`                                                                        | `"1"`          |
| `theme`    | `theme`    | Adapts the text color when used on dark background.        | `"dark" \| "light"`                                                                                             | `"light"`      |
| `type`     | `type`     | The style of the text.                                     | `"headline-1" \| "headline-2" \| "headline-3" \| "headline-4" \| "headline-5" \| "headline-6" \| "large-title"` | `"headline-1"` |
| `wrap`     | `wrap`     | Wraps the text, even when it has to break a word.          | `boolean`                                                                                                       | `false`        |
